class nmmo.lib.task.Inflict(target: nmmo.lib.task.TaskTarget, damage_type, quantity: int)¶

Bases: nmmo.lib.task.TargetTask

target: The team that is completing the task. Any agent may complete damage_type: Can use skills.Melee/Range/Mage quantity: Minimum damage to inflict in a single hit

class nmmo.lib.task.Hoard(target: nmmo.lib.task.TaskTarget, gold)¶

Bases: nmmo.lib.task.Task

target: The team that is completing the task. Completed across the team gold: reach this amount of gold held at one time (inventory.gold sum over team)

Bases: nmmo.lib.task.Task

target: The team that is completing the task. Completed across the team num_teammates: Number of teammates to group together distance: Max distance to nearest teammate

Bases: nmmo.lib.task.Task
